build:finalize.description: Finalize parallel Percy builds where PERCY_PARALLEL_TOTAL=-1

build:wait.description: Wait for a build to be finished. Requires a full access PERCY_TOKEN

commit.name: commit
commit.description: build's commit sha for a project

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: timeout, in milliseconds, to exit when there are no updates, defaults to 10 minutes

interval.name: interval
interval.description: interval, in milliseconds, at which to poll for updates, defaults to 1000

fail-on-changes.name: fail-on-changes
fail-on-changes.description: exits with an error when diffs are found in snapshots
